CS:GO is a classic.  Its still fun in 2020 and continues to challenge its player base.  Speaking of its player base, it is still very large which results in very quick game lobbies across all game modes.  I am very happy with this game especially because its Mac compatible. Play on my PC when I'm home and on my laptop after class.
